## bind_heatmap_data

## Description
 Bind heatmap data 


## Usage
```r
 
bind_heatmap_data( 
  ., 
  data = NULL, 
  x = NULL, 
  y = NULL, 
  value = NULL, 
  filter = NULL 
) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| . | The prior Flourish object. No need to specify name if piping graph as the graph will take the first argument (i.e. the prior existing graph). |
| data | A heatmap data set. |
| x | X axis |
| y | Y axis |
| value | Numeric value |
| filter | Filter |
